linters.name: bandit
linters.description: Security oriented static analyser for python code.

linters.name: brakeman
linters.description: A static analysis security vulnerability scanner for Ruby on Rails applications.

linters.name: coffeelint
linters.description: CoffeeLint is a style checker that helps keep CoffeeScript code clean and consistent.

linters.name: csslint
linters.description: Automated linting of Cascading Stylesheets.

linters.name: deptrac
linters.description: Deptrac is a static code analysis tool that helps to enforce rules for dependencies between software layers.

linters.name: eslint
linters.description: A fully pluggable tool for identifying and reporting on patterns in JavaScript.

linters.name: flake8
linters.description: flake8 is a python tool that glues together pep8, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins to check the style and quality of some python code.

linters.name: flay
linters.description: Flay analyzes code for structural similarities.

linters.name: flog
linters.description: Flog reports the most tortured code in an easy to read pain report.

linters.name: html-inspector
linters.description: HTML Inspector is a code quality tool to help you and your team write better markup.

linters.name: htmlhint
linters.description: HTMLHint is a Static Code Analysis Tool for HTML.

linters.name: jedi
linters.description: Awesome autocompletion and static analysis library for python.

linters.name: jscpd
linters.description: Copy/paste detector for programming source code.

linters.name: jshint
linters.description: JSHint is a tool that helps to detect errors and potential problems in your JavaScript code.

linters.name: jslint
linters.description: The JavaScript Code Quality Tool.

linters.name: linty-fresh
linters.description: Keep your codebase sparkly clean with the power of LINT.

linters.name: lizard
linters.description: A simple code complexity analyser without caring about the C/C++ header files or Java imports, supports most of the popular languages.

linters.name: nsp
linters.description: Node Security helps you keep your node applications secure.

linters.name: ocstyle
linters.description: Objective-C style checker.

linters.name: parse
linters.description: The Parse scanner is a static scanning tool to review your PHP code for potential security-related issues.

linters.name: pep8
linters.description: pep8 is a tool to check your Python code against some of the style conventions in PEP 8.

linters.name: phan
linters.description: Phan is a static analyzer that looks for common issues and will verify type compatibility on various operations when type information is available or can be deduced.

linters.name: php-assumptions
linters.description: PHP Assumptions is a static code analysis tool doing checks for weak assumptions.

linters.name: php_codesniffer
linters.description: PHP_CodeSniffer tokenizes PHP, JavaScript and CSS files to detect and fix violations of a defined set of coding standards.

linters.name: phpcheckstyle
linters.description: PHPCheckstyle is an open-source tool that helps PHP programmers adhere to certain coding conventions.

linters.name: phpcodefixer
linters.description: PhpCodeFixer finds usage of deprecated functions, variables and ini directives in your php code.

linters.name: phplint
linters.description: PHPLint is a validator and documentator for PHP 5 and PHP 7 programs.

linters.name: phpmd
linters.description: It takes a given PHP source code base and look for several potential problems within that source.

linters.name: phpmetrics
linters.description: PhpMetrics provides various metrics about PHP projects.

linters.name: phpsa
linters.description: PHPSA is a development tool aimed at bringing static analysis for PHP applications and libraries.

linters.name: prospector
linters.description: Prospector is a tool to analyse Python code and output information about errors, potential problems, convention violations and complexity.

linters.name: pyflakes
linters.description: Pyflakes analyzes programs and detects various errors.

linters.name: pylint
linters.description: Pylint is a Python source code analyzer which looks for programming errors, helps enforcing a coding standard and sniffs for some code smells.

linters.name: radon
linters.description: Radon is a Python tool that computes various metrics from the source code.

linters.name: rubocop
linters.description: RuboCop is a Ruby static code analyzer.

linters.name: ruby-lint
linters.description: ruby-lint is a static code analysis tool for Ruby.

linters.name: sass-lint
linters.description: A Node-only Sass linter for both sass and scss syntax.

linters.name: stylint
linters.description: Improve your Stylus code with Stylint.

linters.name: tslint
linters.description: TSLint checks your TypeScript code for readability, maintainability, and functionality errors.
